No. 2405/50 - friday ,   OctOber  11,  2024
EXTRAORDINARY
(Published by Authority)
PART I : SECTION (I) — GENERAL
Government  Notifications
1a This Gazette Extraordinary can be downloaded from www.documents.gov.lk
The Gazette of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h
N.B. - this extraordinary Gazette is printed in Sinhala, tamil and english Languages seperately. 
1a - G 42915 - 19 (10/2024)
THE  PARLIAMENTARY  ELECTIONS  ACT,  No. 1 OF 1981
Notice Under Section 24(1)  (b) and (d)
General election to elect Members of the Parliament
NOtice is hereby given under Section 24(1) (b) and (d) of the Parliamentary elections act, No. 1 of 1981 that –
(i) the order in which the name of each recongnized Political Party and the distinguishing number of each independent 
Group and the symbol allotted to each such Party or Group appearing in the ballot paper of each such electoral district shall 
be in the same order as given in the Schedule hereto; and the names of candidates (as indicated by the candidates) of each 
recognized Political Party or independent Group, placed in alphabetical order in accordance with the Sinhala alphabet, 
nominated for election as Members of Parliament from each such electoral district and the preferential number assigned to 
each candidate, are as specified in the Schedule hereto ;
(ii) the situation of the polling station or stations for each of the polling districts in each such electoral district, 
and the particular polling stations reserved for female voters, if any, are as specified in the Schedule hereto. 
 R. M. A. L. Rathnayake, M. A. P. C. Perera, Ameer Faaiz,  
 chairman, Member, Member,  
 election commission. election commission. election commission.  
  A. Shanmuganathan, Prof. Lakshman Dissanayake,
  Member, Member,
  election commission. election commission.
election commission,
Office of the Election Commission,
Sarana Mawatha, 
rajagiriya,
11th day of October, 2024.
